title: Torrent™ Blender - One Touch | KitchenAid
description: The revolutionary Torrent™ Blender from KitchenAid® is the perfect blend of power, style—and ingredients. You can pulse, juice, or make anything from soups to smoothies easily with just one touch. Simply choose the right blending option, and you’re on your way to creating your favorite recipes. So you can blend more, and work less.
